chunk:
Dr.Jart+ Cicapair™ Intensive Soothing Repair Treatment Lotion to Reduce Redness

Brand: Dr. Jart+

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER\AQUA\EAU, PROPANEDIOL, DIPROPYLENE GLYCOL, 1,2-HEXANEDIOL, GLYCERIN, METHYLPROPANEDIOL, BETAINE, ALLANTOIN, PANTHENOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, SODIUM HYALURONATE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, POLYGLYCERYL-4 OLEATE, CENTELLA ASIATICA LEAF EXTRACT, SODIUM STEAROYL GLUTAMATE, ASIATICOSIDE, MADECASSIC ACID, ASIATIC ACID, PALMITOYL TRIPEPTIDE-8,

SODIUM HYALURONATE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, POLYGLYCERYL-4 OLEATE, CENTELLA ASIATICA LEAF EXTRACT, SODIUM STEAROYL GLUTAMATE, ASIATICOSIDE, MADECASSIC ACID, ASIATIC ACID, PALMITOYL TRIPEPTIDE-8, XANTHAN GUM, SODIUM SURFACTIN, ISOPENTYLDIOL, DEXTRAN, TOCOPHEROL

Directions: Apply an even layer to clean skin morning and night

Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
